info.title: RAG Web Browser
info.description: Web browser for OpenAI Assistants API and RAG pipelines, similar to a web browser in ChatGPT. It queries Google Search, scrapes the top N pages from the results, and returns their cleaned content as Markdown for further processing by an LLM.

get.summary: Web browser and page content extractor
get.description: Web browser for OpenAI Assistants API and RAG pipelines, similar to a web browser in ChatGPT. It queries Google Search, scrapes the top N pages from the results, and returns their cleaned content as Markdown for further processing.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Enter Google Search keywords or a URL to a specific web page. The keywords might include the Google's advanced search operators, e.g. site:example.com

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of top organic Google Search results whose web pages will be extracted. If `query` is a URL, then this parameter is ignored and the Actor only fetches the specific web page.

parameters.name: outputFormats
parameters.description: Select the desired output formats for the retrieved content

parameters.name: requestTimeoutSecs
parameters.description: The maximum time (in seconds) allowed for request. If the request exceeds this time, it will be marked as failed and only already finished results will be returned

parameters.name: serpProxyGroup
parameters.description: Proxy group for loading search results.

parameters.name: serpMaxRetries
parameters.description: Maximum retries for Google search requests on errors.

parameters.name: maxRequestRetries
parameters.description: Maximum retries for Playwright content crawler.

parameters.name: dynamicContentWaitSecs
parameters.description: Time to wait for dynamic content to load (seconds).

parameters.name: removeCookieWarnings
parameters.description: Removes cookie consent dialogs to improve text extraction.

parameters.name: debugMode
parameters.description: Stores debugging information in dataset if enabled.
